author: Chaython
body:

Like https://fishshell.com/

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @Chaython Please add more information what you are requesting. It seems the features is already in PSReadline.

comments.author: rjmholt
comments.body:
Closing this as more details are required and with the details supplied this is likely several issues. I believe PSReadLine has a few recent additions inspired by fish.

If you'd like to add more specifics about a particular feature you'd like to see, feel free to reopen afterward.

title: Feature Request: Autosuggestions, persistent, history logging
